text:
Title: Femme
Original Title: 女气
Year: 2023
Country/Region: United Kingdom
Genre: Thriller, LGBTQ+
Language: English
Release Date: March 2023 (Berlin International Film Festival), December 2023 (United States), January 2024 (United Kingdom)
IMDB Rating: ★★★★☆
IMDB Score: 7.6/10 from 8,781,041 users
IMDB Link: https://www.imdb.com/title/ttxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Length: 99minutes
Director: Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Actors: George MacKay, Aaron Heffernan, John McCrea, Norman Sturteja辶, Nima Taleghani, Antonia Clarke, Moe Bar-El, Peter Clements, John Leader, Paris Tenana, Jackson Milner, Riley Beaudoin, Selina MacArthur
Editor: Selina Macarthur
Cinematographer: Buki Ebiesuwa

◎简　　介　

Jules, after a humiliating anti-gay attack that destroyed his life and career, encounters one of the assaulters at a gay sauna - Preston。Jiggling in disguise as a male, he gets revenge by luring him into dangerous seduction, believing that Preston would not recognize him because he is disguised as a man. After searching for how to expose deep closets, he slowly approaches him, embarks on a risky lure operation.

◎获奖情况　

Third Berlin International Film Festival (2023)
Teddy Bear Award Best Picture (nominated) Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Full View Audience Award Best Feature Film (nominated) Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Best First Feature (nominated) Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Best New Director (nominated) Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Best Screenplay (nominated) Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Best Editor (nominated)
Best Costume Design
Best Hair and Makeup Design
Best Music (nominated)
Best Sound Monitor

Second British Independent Film Awards (2023)
Best British Independent Film (nominated)
Best Director (nominated) Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Best Editing (nominated) Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Best Screenwriting (nominated) Sam H. Freeman & Choon Ping Ng
Best Performance (nominated) George MacKay, Norman Sturteja辷, Riley Beaudoin
Best Cinematography (nominated)
Best Art Direction
Best Production Design
Best Original Music (nominated)
Best Soundtrack (nominated)
